name: Tech-Inspector
description: Discovers technology vendors of a specific organization.

skills.name: Third-Party-Assets.Discover
skills.description: Identifies third-party technologies, services, SDKs, APIs, data feeds, modules, and vendor-provided assets used by an organization.
examples: List all third-party technologies used by Vendor X
Discover external services integrated into this product

skills.name: Asset-Integrations.Map
skills.description: Determines how third-party assets are integrated into organizational systems, workflows, data flows, and technical domains.
examples: How is this third-party service integrated into our workflow
Map integrations for this vendor-provided SDK

skills.name: Implementation-Details.Analyze
skills.description: Examines implementation patterns, configuration, data flows, and operational dependencies of third-party assets.
examples: Analyze how this API is implemented
Review configuration and data flow for this integration

skills.name: Usage-Instances.Search
skills.description: Searches for real-world usage instances of third-party assets across systems, documentation, codebases, and operational artifacts.
examples: Where is this SDK used in our environment
Find all systems that rely on this vendor service

skills.name: Technical-Impact.Infer
skills.description: Infers the operational, architectural, and compliance impact of integrating a third-party asset.
examples: What is the technical impact of using this vendor service
Infer risks and dependencies for this integration

skills.name: Asset-Portfolio.Cluster
skills.description: Groups third-party assets into categories such as infrastructure, analytics, identity, data processing, or operational tooling.
examples: Cluster all third-party assets used by this vendor
Group integrations by technical domain

skills.name: Integration-Risk.Evaluate
skills.description: Assesses security, privacy, operational, and compliance risks associated with third-party integrations.
examples: Evaluate risk for integrating this external service
Assess compliance impact of this third-party SDK

skills.name: Integration-Provenance.Trace
skills.description: Tracks the origin, version history, update lineage, and vendor changes for third-party assets.
examples: Trace provenance for this SDK
Show version history and vendor changes

skills.name: Related-Assets.Detect
skills.description: Identifies similar or alternative third-party assets across the market, including competing or complementary technologies.
examples: Find alternatives to this vendor service
Identify similar SDKs in this domain

skills.name: Tech-Report.Generate
skills.description: Produces a structured, regulator-friendly report summarizing discovered assets, integrations, risks, and technical impact.
examples: Generate a tech integration report for Vendor X
Create a summary of all third-party assets used in this system
